sentences.english: Touching down on the runway is a Concorde supersonic jet.
sentences.chinese: 一架協和式超音速客機正降落在跑道上。

sentences.english: The airliner flew above the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 大型客機在雲層上面飛行。

sentences.english: Concorde was the first passenger aircraft to fly at supersonic speed.
sentences.chinese: 協和式飛機是第一架超音速客機。

sentences.english: The jetliner leveled off in its approach to the runway.
sentences.chinese: 噴氣客機在接近跑道時改爲平飛。

sentences.english: Air France spokesman said several of the plane`s mechanisms had malfunctioned.
sentences.chinese: 據法航發言人透露，失蹤客機曾發生多處機械故障。

sentences.english: Lockheed TriStar touches down 'hands off' at Palmdale, California;
sentences.chinese: 一架洛克希德三星客機自動降落在加州棕欖島。

sentences.english: The aerobus is direct to land a match field, model most bad also get aircraft carrier class.
sentences.chinese: 客機直接降落賽場，機型最差也得航空母艦級。

sentences.english: Airbus has had delays with its huge, new A-Three-Eighty passenger plane.
sentences.chinese: 因此空中客車推遲了新款巨型A380客機的生產。

sentences.english: For example, fewer than 1% of all commercial airline pilots are female.
sentences.chinese: 例如，商用客機的駕駛員是女性的比例不到1%。

sentences.english: Transfer to airport for your flight back to Brunei.
sentences.chinese: 送往機場，乘搭新航客機回返汶萊。

sentences.english: The air-liner was calling the control tower at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 這架大型客機正在向機場的指揮塔臺呼叫。

sentences.english: Depart from hometown to the capital of food, Taipei.
sentences.chinese: 由原居地出發乘坐豪華客機飛往美食之都臺北。

sentences.english: He never travels by private jet, although he owns the world's.
sentences.chinese: 他雖然是世界最大的私人噴射客機公司的老闆。

sentences.english: The modern wide-bodied jetliner is very large.
sentences.chinese: 現代寬體噴氣式客機是很大的。

sentences.english: The wide-body jet was filled with well-off Iranian people.
sentences.chinese: 寬體客機坐滿了富裕的伊朗人。

sentences.english: The aircraft they used for last flight was a jumbo jet.
sentences.chinese: 他們用巨無霸的噴射客機作爲上個航次飛行機種。

definition: China Airlines (Taiwan)/abbr. for 中華航空公司|中华航空公司[Zhong1 hua2 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1]
opportunity in a battle/fighter aircraft/war secret
(of an airplane etc) to fall to the ground and crash
